# Macquarie Bullish on NIO (NIO) After Strong Volume Growth

Sheryar Siddiq

Thu, January 29, 2026 at 11:07 PM PST2 min read

[NIO \\
-1.47%](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/NIO/ "NIO")

[NIOIF \\
+0.21%](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/NIOIF/ "NIOIF")

NIO Inc. (NYSE: [NIO](https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/NIO)) ranks among the **[best high growth Chinese stocks to buy](https://www.insidermonkey.com/blog/8-high-growth-chinese-stocks-to-buy-1679808/?singlepage=1)**. On January 15, Macquarie upgraded NIO Inc. (NYSE:NIO) from Neutral to Outperform, boosting its price target to $6.10. According to the firm, NIO’s fourth-quarter 2025 sales exceeded the upper end of its 125,000-unit forecast, with a healthy demand for ES8 and Firefly models generating a 44% quarter-over-quarter volume increase.

![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

Macquarie noted NIO’s increased adoption of its Battery-as-a-Service (BaaS) initiative, which currently accounts for more than 80% of sales, highlighting that this should further protect the firm from industry headwinds by keeping potentially greater battery costs off the balance sheet.
